```{r}
devtools::load_all()
```

ftplottools has two major components:

\- The Colors (along with pallettes and scales)

\- Theme components to be applied as one.

## Colors

### Getting the colors:

```{r}
ft_colors()
```

```{r}
ft_colors("claret", "oxford")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg, hp, fill = as.factor(cyl))) +
  geom_col() +
  # scale_fill_manual(values = ft_colors("claret", "sky", "oxford")) +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 14)) +
  labs(title = "James") +
  # theme(plot.title.position = "plot") +
  ft_theme(legend_right = T)
```

## Getting the palettes 

The first arguments is the number of colors requested.

```{r}
origami_primary(1)
origami_primary(15)
```

## Scales

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg, hp, fill = as.factor(cyl))) +
  geom_col() +
  # scale_fill_ft() +
  scale_color_ft()
```
